scripts:
set ACL for user-request-persistence-service
   allow jcr:read on /
    end

set ACL for user-request-persistence-service
   allow jcr:read on /apps/acs-commons/components/utilities/user-request-tracker
 end

set ACL for user-request-persistence-service
   allow jcr:read,jcr:write on /var
    end

set ACL for user-request-persistence-service
   allow jcr:read,jcr:write,jcr:nodeTypeManagement,jcr:addChildNodes,jcr:modifyProperties,rep:write on /var/analytics/user-tracking
    end

set ACL for user-request-persistence-service
   allow jcr:read on /home/users
    end

set ACL for user-request-persistence-service
   allow jcr:read,jcr:write,jcr:nodeTypeManagement,jcr:addChildNodes,jcr:modifyProperties,rep:write on /apps/cq/core/content/nav/tools
    end
